user.title: Set-up Music Assistant
user.description: Please configure which music providers you want to enable. For each enabled music provider, enter your credentials below.

data.filesystem_directory: Directory on disk to your music files.
data.playlists_directory: Directory on disk to your playlists (m3u) files (optional).

data_description.filesystem_directory: Specify the full path on disk where your media files are stored (e.g. /media). Note that Home Assistant must have access to this location.

error.directory_not_exists: Directory does not exist or not accessible

init.title: Configure Music Assistant
init.description: Configure which Home Assistant media players you would like to use with Music Assistant.

data.hide_source_players: Hide source players in the Home Assistant UI.
data.create_mass_players: Create mediaplayers for Music Assistant players in Home Assistant.

music.title: Configure Music Assistant
music.description: Configure which music providers you want to enable. For each enabled music provider, enter your credentials below.

data.filesystem_directory: Directory on disk to your music files.
data.playlists_directory: Directory on disk to your playlists (m3u) files (optional).

data_description.filesystem_directory: Specify the full path on disk where your media files are stored (e.g. /media). Note that Home Assistant must have access to this location.

adv.title: Configure Music Assistant
adv.description: Configure advanced options for Music Assistant.

data.mute_power_players: Use mute as power control for these players.

data_description.mute_power_players: Some players do not have a good/real power on/off or this disturbs with grouped playback (e.g. cast). With this option you can use the mute control as power for these players.

error.directory_not_exists: Directory does not exist or not accessible

frontend.reboot_required: A reboot is required to activate the new settings!

crossfademode.strict: Strict: Do not crossfade tracks of same album or different sample rate
crossfademode.smart: Smart: Crossfade tracks when possible (without downsampling)
crossfademode.always: Crossfade all tracks (resamples all audio to fixed rate)

frontend.no_content_sync_running: Items not (yet) available. Please wait for the Library synchronization to complete.
